offer.offer_name: NT Fiber Vidhyarthi Data Only Offer

package_details.package_name: NT Fiber Vidhyarthi Data Only Offer

included_with_offer: 1 unit Dual Band CPE free of cost.
Drop fiber free of cost (up to 100 meters maximum).
required_documents: Valid Student ID Card must be submitted along with the application form.
Clear proof of date of birth (Birth Certificate/Citizenship) must be submitted. This offer is only applicable to students born in or after the Nepali year 2054 BS.
For minors, a copy of the parent's/guardian's Citizenship, License, or Passport must be submitted.
offer.contact_for_installation: Contact 198 within the application period to apply for service installation.
terms_and_conditions: After validity expires, renewal with the same package is not possible. Those wishing to continue the service must select from previous packages for renewal.
If renewal is not desired, the provided CPE must be returned.
Maximum drop fiber available up to 100 meters.
notes: The offer title includes 'विद्यार्थी' (Vidhyarthi) which means 'Student' in Nepali.
The package is labeled as 'Data Only Offer'.
Dates are referenced in the Nepali calendar (Bikram Sambat/BS).
